categories: Category:Cut content from Light and Shadow

nodes.text: Cayli was a Jedi and the student of Ven-Mah Tyrrahl. She was trained on Monfreen, along with Lian Dray and Yeres Threem. During their time together, Cayli and Dray fell in love, but she was horrified when she learned that Dray had fallen to the dark side and killed Threem. Dray then left the Jedi, although he later redeemed himself and hoped that Cayli still cared for him.
